title: Terminator-style liquid metal morphs into physical shapes
text:
Terminator-style liquid metal morphs into physical shapes 1:44pm GMT - 01:06 
UK-based researchers have applied electrical charges to manipulate liquid metal into 2D shapes, bringing to mind the terrifying T-1000 character in the Terminator film franchise, which comes to life from a pool of similar material. Jim Drury reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
UK-based researchers have applied electrical charges to manipulate liquid metal into 2D shapes, bringing to mind the terrifying T-1000 character in the Terminator film franchise, which comes to life from a pool of similar material. Jim Drury reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EuNQM3
